there isn't necessarily a solution for your problem. ATI's Linux driver support has been improving recently, but not so much for older devices. Use the open source driver and get by with the little acceleration that it provides.
and, yes, Windows support will definitely be better for your card, because ATI are keeping its internals secret from free software developers.
